infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app uses the calendar so that the user can plan routes from the application and get notified when he need to go on that route.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses location to calculate distance to monuments, and show to the user an route.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses location to calculate distance to monuments, and show to the user an route.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses location to calculate distance to monuments, and show to the user an route.
